channel.title: Amazing New PK clan ! join Now!
channel.description:
if it asks who told u about this juss say ferrariownz -------------------------------------------------- Welcome to Soulslayers!
Links To The Clan: http://s15.invisionfree.com/soulslayers OR http://www.soulslayers.tk
About The Clan: This is a new pk clan started 17.February, we have one pk trip in a week that is official and everyone should come to. The leaders of the clan is drakeofmagic and deathwing432
Joining The Clan: If you want to join the clan you go to http://s15.invisionfree.com/SoulSlayers/in...php?showtopic=1 and see if you have the requirements, if you have the requirements you go to http://s15.invisionfree.com/SoulSlayers/in...hp?showtopic=11 and copy what you see there. after that you go to http://s15.invisionfree.com/SoulSlayers/in...php?showforum=1 and click on "New Topic" and then you right click and paste what you have copied. Then you write your stats and the other things there and then you click at "Post New Topic".
Being Validated: After you have posted it you wait for the members of the clan to decide if you can join or not. When you have being accepted you can come to pk trips, use the forum to discuss and trade with other members.
Thanks for Joining Hope u have FUN !!! -----------------------------------------------------

item.title: Amazing New PK clan ! join Now!
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

if it asks who told u about this juss say ferrariownz

Welcome to Soulslayers!

Links To The Clan:
http://s15.invisionfree.com/soulslayers OR http://www.soulslayers.tk

About The Clan:
This is a new pk clan started 17.February, we have one pk trip in a week that is official and everyone should come to. The leaders of the clan is drakeofmagic and deathwing432

Joining The Clan:
If you want to join the clan you go to http://s15.invisionfree.com/SoulSlayers/in...php?showtopic=1 and see if you have the requirements, if you have the requirements you go to http://s15.invisionfree.com/SoulSlayers/in...hp?showtopic=11 and copy what you see there. after that you go to http://s15.invisionfree.com/SoulSlayers/in...php?showforum=1 and click on “New Topic” and then you right click and paste what you have copied.
Then you write your stats and the other things there and then you click at “Post New Topic”.

Being Validated:
After you have posted it you wait for the members of the clan to decide if you can join or not. When you have being accepted you can come to pk trips, use the forum to discuss and trade with other members.

Thanks for Joining Hope u have FUN !!!
